Public Remarks: Enjoy this affordable acreage offering privacy, views and room to roam. This 151-acre property is divided by a creek that flows into the Nadina River that flows into Francois Lake. There are internal trails, that were used for logging, to take you to a bluff that offers views of the Nadina River Valley and Nadina Mountain. The southern portion of the property borders the Nadina River, with over 2,000 feet of riverfront. Live the dream...!!
